channel.title: NPC Attack On Sight/Raidius
channel.description: Okay well i'm coding a server and theres a staff castle that only admins+ can enter the castle, players are still able to get to the castle entrance and I have "Castle Guardians" Level 30,000 Anyways none of this matters but I'd like the Guardians attack players that are spotted by the NPC's or get in a certain raidius that if you get in that area the NPC/NPC's Attack that player, Please Help Me. I really need this

item.title: NPC Attack On Sight/Raidius
item.dc:creator: @pobdol pobdol
item.description:
@pobdol wrote:

Okay well i’m coding a server and theres a staff castle that only admins+ can enter the castle, players are still able to get to the castle entrance and I have “Castle Guardians” Level 30,000 Anyways none of this matters but I’d like the Guardians attack players that are spotted by the NPC’s or get in a certain raidius that if you get in that area the NPC/NPC’s Attack that player, Please Help Me. I really need this
